participant_1.background:
I like to cook for my family and friends because it allows me to relax and be creative.
i am not social.
My spouse is my manager and helps me with my career as a lead singer.
I am moving to a new city to pursue my dreams.
I am passionate about capturing the beauty of the world around me, even when I'm not feeling well.

participant_2.background:
I usually wake up early in the morning to help my wife get the kids ready for school.
My favorite fruit is watermelon because it is sweet and refreshing.
my feet smell.
Others may be disappointed that I didn't pass the audition, but I'll keep trying my best.
I have never been arrested, but I have been warned by the police for riding my horse too fast.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! Just got back from a long hike. I'm really tired, but I'm glad I did it.
That's awesome! I wish I could go hiking more often. I'm usually too busy with work and family stuff.
I can understand that. I'm lucky that my spouse is my manager and helps me with my career as a lead singer. That way I can still be active and do what I love.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to be a singer, but I'm not very good.
Don't be so hard on yourself! I'm sure you're better than you think.
No problem! What do you do for work?
I'm a teacher. I usually wake up early in the morning to help my wife get the kids ready for school.
That's a lot of responsibility! I'm sure you're a great teacher.
It sounds like you have a lot on your plate, but you're doing great!
